link.title: Stanley Elementary - Jr. High School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

p.img: We appreciate all your support and guidance to ensure your child's education continues!

span.p: We will have materials available Monday, May 4, 2020 for delivery or pick-up. Shanna Lammers will be contacting parents over the next several days to see if your child, who normally rides the bus, would like lunch and materials delivered. Available times to pick-up your child’s items are between 11:00 am to 1:00 pm.

Challis School District is following the State Board of Education’s soft closure through May 21, 2020. After listening to Governor Little’s plan outlining the stages of reopening the economy on Thursday, April 23, 2020 and clarifying discussions with District Health; it is evident that our schools could not meet criteria to fully return this calendar year.

We will continue with online learning and once again express our sincere gratitude to parents/guardians and countless others who have supported Challis School District staff to ensure student learning.

a.title: Click to read more about: Soft Closure Update

div.a: Read More about Soft Closure Update

span.p: Challis School District will be delivering sack lunches and breakfasts to our outlying communities. The buses will leave Challis at 11:00 each day. We will run two buses; one upriver and one down river.

p.strong: Bus #1 will make the following stops:
Bus #2 will make the following stops:

span.p: Please email or text Sara Jones by midnight the night before delivery to pre-order meals so we can have an estimated number of meals that are needed. You can request to have a meal delivered daily for the entire week or you can order for specific days. Pre-ordering meals are not required, if you do not order you can still come and pick up meals, but it is requested when possible to order. Make sure you are at the location closest to you, to pick-up your lunch/breakfast between the times indicated.

p.strong: Families are not allowed to pick up additional meals at multiple delivery locations, families are allowed one meal a day per child 0-18 living in the household (adults can order meals for $4.00 which is due at time of delivery).

span.p: Meals can be picked up at Challis Elementary School from 11:00 – 1:00 pm, in a drive-up fashion. You will not be coming into the building. Please use 9th Street past Bluff Avenue to the ice-skating rink, continue around the rink to the back of the school. Staff will bring the meals to you from the back-cafeteria door. Signs will be posted.

div.a: 50th Anniversary of Earth Day April 27, , Ends @ 11:00 AM
Board Meeting May 12, @Challis Elementary Board Room, 5:00 PM — 8:00 PM
High School Graduation May 17, @Challis Jr. Sr. High School, 2:00 PM — 5:00 PM

p.em: Challis School District strives to inspire students to take an active role in their education through partnerships with stakeholders, acquiring the knowledge, skills and core values necessary to achieve personal success and enrich the community.
Challis School District believes all students should have confidence in their power to embrace learning, to excel and to own their future.
